MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L28 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting customers in Barons Hey and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:44PM. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 10:00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:31PM on 9th April 2021
